mdRecord.dcterms:title: La prison damours, laquelle traicte de lamour de Leriano & Laureole / faict en Espaignol: puis translate en tusquan: et nagueres en lange Francois. ; Ensemble plusieurs choses singulieres a la louēge des dames Imprime nouuellement
Prison damours
San Pedro, Diego de, active 1500. Cárcel de amor. French (Middle French)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: San Pedro, Diego de, active 1500
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Imprime nouuellement a Paris [No name, unknown, or undetermined
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colophon dated: le vingt et vnisme iour de May.
Translated by Gilles Corrozet from the Italian of Lelio Manfredi. Cf. Rothschild, James De. Catalogue des livres, t. 2, no. 1747.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplates of Baron Double, Edouard Moura and Edouard Rahir. Unidentified armorial bookplate (bird, holding snake). Unidentified monogram bookplate, "EM" or "ME." Unidentified armorial bookplate (lion holding crest with "Libro Libeur") Initials "HM", i.e. Henri Monod, in gilt on front cover. Also from the library of Armand Cigongne, according to Rahir Catalogue, ptie. 2, no. 666. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 716.
